ILR_0.label: No Functional Proficiency
ILR_0.official_summary: Unable to speak the language in almost any context; oral production limited to isolated words.

ILR_0_plus.label: Memorized Proficiency
ILR_0_plus.official_summary: Produces memorized words and phrases with little regard to context; utterances are minimal and telegraphic.

ILR_1.label: Elementary Proficiency
ILR_1.official_summary: Maintains simple exchanges on topics related to self despite pervasive errors.

ILR_1_plus.label: Elementary Plus
ILR_1_plus.official_summary: Initiates and maintains simple conversations beyond basic needs, though inaccurately.
expected_evidence: limited ability to discuss work or events

ILR_2.label: Limited Working Proficiency
ILR_2.official_summary: Communicates intended meaning in routine social and work-related interactions.

ILR_2_plus.label: Limited Working Plus
ILR_2_plus.official_summary: Communicates fully in many informal contexts and some professional contexts, though not consistently precise.

ILR_3.label: General Professional Proficiency
ILR_3.official_summary: Participates effectively in formal and informal contexts on general professional and societal topics.

ILR_3_plus.label: General Professional Plus
ILR_3_plus.official_summary: Uses culturally appropriate language and complex discourse strategies with occasional loss of precision.
expected_evidence: use of idioms and cultural references

ILR_4.label: Advanced Professional Proficiency
ILR_4.official_summary: Speaks with precision on a wide range of topics; can persuade, negotiate, and present formally.
contradictory_evidence: effortless native-level performance across all contexts

ILR_4_plus.label: Advanced Professional Plus
ILR_4_plus.official_summary: Produces articulate, nuanced language in most contexts with only rare mistakes.
contradictory_evidence: complete native mastery in all contexts

ILR_5.label: Functionally Native Proficiency
ILR_5.official_summary: Demonstrates mastery of the language with complete flexibility in almost any context.

validation_outcomes.agree: Observed evidence aligns with official ILR descriptors
validation_outcomes.borderline: Observed evidence overlaps adjacent ILR levels
validation_outcomes.disagree: Observed evidence contradicts claimed ILR level
